Faith-healing on the faith of the healee, not the healor; thus may charlatans make miracles. Prayer is self-talk, that's why it works. Greta has it 100% right as far as i'm concerned.
BTW, my own book discussing the Reality behind Religion, will be out in May or June. It is called "It Was Too Soon Before." According to Christians, Jesus is still up there above the clouds, with his Dad, the magic old man with a white beard, waiting until it is safe to come back down and send all the sinners to hell and turn the earth into Paradise for the righteous. Oh, and it's Our Fault that he died in the first place. Bullshit pure and simple.
Keep it up, Greta! I for one agree with you!
